title.rendered: 2 Nights 3 Days Jagannath Puri Tour Packages

content.rendered:
Table of Contents

  • Essential Tips for an Unforgettable Jagannath Puri Tour Packages
  • Top Experiences to Enhance Your Puri Tour Itinerary
  • Itinerary of Our Jaganath Puri Tour Packages

Experience the Charm of Jagannath Puri with Our 3-Days, 2-Nights Puri Tour Packages. Immerse yourself in the spiritual serenity, cultural wonders, and coastal beauty of this enchanting destination. With thoughtfully curated experiences and comfortable accommodations, this package promises a memorable journey to the heart of Puri.

Essential Tips for an Unforgettable Jagannath Puri Tour Packages

Pack appropriate attire suitable for the coastal climate and your planned activities. Opt for accommodations near the pristine beaches, embrace local transportation, and explore the city on foot for an authentic experience. Booking your accommodations in advance is advisable, especially during the peak tourist season. Relish local cuisine and savor the unique flavors of Puri.

DURATION

2 Nights 3 Days

HOTEL CATEGORY

3 / 4 / 5 Star

PICKUP & DROP

Puri/Bhubaneswar

EXPERIENCE

Premium

Respect local customs and traditions, carry essential items, and be mindful of the environment. Stay updated on weather conditions, particularly if you have outdoor plans. Make the most of your time in this spiritual and coastal paradise.

Top Experiences to Enhance Your Puri Tour Itinerary

Beach Serenity: Enjoy the tranquility and beauty of Puri’s pristine beaches, offering a peaceful escape from the bustling world. Explore Sacred Sites: Visit revered landmarks like the Jagannath Temple and Gundicha Temple, showcasing Puri’s rich religious heritage. Local Cuisine: Delight in the flavors of local Odia cuisine, a delectable fusion of tastes influenced by various cultures. Cultural Exploration: Immerse yourself in the unique culture of Puri by attending traditional dance and music performances, a glimpse into the rich heritage.

Sunrise at Puri Beach: Witness the breathtaking sunrise at Puri Beach, a moment of serenity and beauty. Handicraft Shopping: Shop for traditional Odisha handicrafts and souvenirs at local markets, such as Utkalika or Pipli. Chilika Lake Visit: Explore the mesmerizing Chilika Lake, the largest coastal lagoon in India, and spot the diverse birdlife and dolphins.

Savor the local culinary delights, shop for unique souvenirs, and immerse yourself in the rich culture and history of Puri. Don’t miss the opportunity to experience the spiritual and coastal beauty of this serene destination.

Choose our Puri Tour Packages to explore the charm and allure of this coastal gem and create lasting memories in this spiritual haven.

Choose our Royal Rajasthan Tour Package to explore the grandeur and charm of this incredible state.

Itinerary of Our Jaganath Puri Tour Packages

DAY 1

Arrival in Spiritual Puri

➥ Arrive at Bhubaneswar Airport, where our friendly representative will warmly greet you.

➥ Begin your journey with a scenic drive to Puri, a city renowned for its spirituality.

➥ Check in to your comfortable accommodation in Puri, offering a serene atmosphere.

➥ After a refreshing welcome drink, head to the sacred Jagannath Temple, a significant Hindu pilgrimage site.

➥  Explore the temple premises, witness the rituals, and immerse yourself in the spiritual ambiance.

➥ Return to your hotel for a traditional Odia dinner, featuring local flavors and specialties.

DAY 2

Spiritual Exploration and Cultural Discoveries

➥ Enjoy a delicious breakfast at your hotel, preparing you for an enriching day.

➥ Begin the day with a visit to the Alarnath Temple, a spiritual site dedicated to Lord Jagannath.

➥ Explore the temple and its surroundings, gaining insights into the local traditions and spirituality.

➥ Return to your hotel for a delectable lunch, featuring a blend of Odia and coastal cuisine.

➥ Continue your journey to the UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Sun Temple in Konark.

➥ Marvel at the architectural marvel, rich history, and intricate carvings of this iconic temple.

➥ Head to the sacred Sakshi Gopal Temple, dedicated to Lord Krishna, before returning to Puri.

➥ Enjoy a traditional Odia dinner at your hotel, marking the end of an eventful day.

DAY 3

Coastal Beauty and Departure

➥ Start your day early with a visit to the picturesque Puri Beach to witness the breathtaking sunrise.

➥ Capture the stunning views and the serene ambiance, creating lasting memories.

➥ Return to your hotel for a wholesome breakfast to energize your morning.

➥ Check out from your hotel, bidding farewell to the spiritual city of Puri.

➥ Our representative will transfer you back to Bhubaneswar Airport, ensuring a smooth and relaxed departure.

Inclusions

  • Pickup and drop to and from the Airport/Railway Station.
  • Complete sightseeing by a Private AC Vehicle
  • All Taxes, Tolls, Parking & Driver Expense.
  • Breakfast / Dinner Included.

Exclusions

  • Any private expenses, room service charges
  • Any entry charge to any public or private place.
  • Anything that is not mentioned in the inclusions

This 3-Days, 2-Nights Puri Tour Packages offers a perfect blend of spirituality, cultural exploration, and coastal beauty. It’s a journey that immerses you in the rich traditions and history of Puri while allowing you to enjoy the serene beauty of the region. Book now to create lasting memories in this enchanting destination with our Puri Tour Packages.

“Puri Tour Packages provided the perfect blend of cultural exploration and comfort. As Indian travelers, we appreciated the insights and the memorable visit to Gundicha Temple.“

Kriti and Arjun

Activities recommended by locals during your Puri Tour Packages:

  • Visit Jagannath Temple: Explore the revered temple and witness daily rituals.
  • Catch Sunrise at Puri Beach: Experience a breathtaking sunrise on the serene beach.
  • Explore Gundicha Temple: Immerse in the tranquility and learn about its religious significance.
  • Shop for Handicrafts: Browse local markets for Odisha’s unique handicrafts and souvenirs.
  • Savor Odia Cuisine: Enjoy traditional Odia dishes for an authentic culinary experience. 

Personal expenses, additional activities not mentioned in the itinerary, and meals outside of those specified are not included. Any travel insurance or optional add-ons will also be at the traveller’s discretion. This allows you the flexibility to customize your experience to suit your preferences.
